solution_line_template: In a week, working {hours_per_day} hours a day, Bob logs {hours_per_day}*{days_per_week} = <<{hours_per_day}*{days_per_week}={hours_per_week}>>{hours_per_week} hours

After a month with {weeks_per_month} weeks, Bob logs {weeks_per_month}*{hours_per_week} = <<{weeks_per_month}*{hours_per_week}={total_hours_per_month}>>{total_hours_per_month} hours for his office working hours.
